issue.title: sp_member_access errors all over: use boost::make_shared instead

content.raw: I am going to close this as I couldn't reproduce the problem in a simple plugin. For the future, I don't understand what the boost pointers buy you over the STL. Whenever we move forward on modern C++, let's go with std::make_shared throughout.
